about_the_game:
Saw-slicing, metal-melting, steel-on-steel robot destruction! In this robot battle arena game, create and customize your own fighting robot and pit it against rival bots in an online multiplayer battle arena!

Welcome, fellow Reject!
In the future, society has banned robot fighting and rejected all who practice it. But if you’re here, that means you're craving the action, mayhem and destruction that only robot-on-robot combat can provide.

Design the ultimate fighting machine with a near infinite level of bot customization. Innovate and experiment with countless robot types, body shapes, and weapons to create the perfect conductor for a symphony of robot destruction. Then, step into the arena and test your strength against rival bots in one vs. one, team matches, online tournaments and more.

Will you rise to the challenge and claim your title as Ruler of the Rejects? Or will you crumble in the face of chaos and be left nothing more than a pile of mangled steel and humiliation?

Features

  • Online 1v1 and team multiplayer
  • Over 50+ different weapon types
  • 100s of robot customization options
  • Online voice and text chat
  • More action-packed game modes to be announced

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760, AMD Radeon R7 270X, or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or later
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
